languages.text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It encompasses the subconscious ability to react to things that the conscious mind may not perceive.
Awareness allows a character to notice traps, cleverly hidden objects, secret passages, and unusual or suspicious elements in the environment.
languages.original_text:
Этот навык зависит от характеристики Восприятие.
Навык отражает подсознательную способность реагировать на то, что сознание может не воспринимать.
Он позволяет замечать ловушки, хитро спрятанные предметы, потайные ходы или обращать внимание на любопытные или подозрительные детали в окружающей обстановке.

traits.locale_text:
This skill depends on Perception characteristic.
It encompasses the subconscious ability to react to things that conscious mind may not perceive.
Awareness allows a character to notice traps, cleverly hidden objects, secret passages, and unusual or suspicious environment details.

Awareness allows a character to notice traps, cleverly hidden objects, secret passages, and unusual or suspicious environment details.

This skill is affected by the Perception characteristic.
It encompasses the subconscious ability to react to things that the conscious mind may not perceive.
Awareness allows a character to notice traps, cleverly hidden objects, secret passages, and unusual or suspicious elements in the environment.

languages.text:
Diese Fertigkeit wird durch die {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaft{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} beeinflusst.
Sie umfasst die Fähigkeit des Unterbewusstseins, auf Dinge zu reagieren, die der bewusste Verstand vielleicht nicht wahrnimmt.
Die Wahrnehmung ermöglicht es einem Charakter, Fallen, geschickt versteckte Objekte, Geheimgänge und ungewöhnliche oder verdächtige Elemente in der Umgebung zu erkennen.

It encompasses the subconscious ability to react to things that the conscious mind may not perceive.

traits.locale_text:
Diese Fertigkeit wird durch die Eigenschaft Wahrnehmung beeinflusst.
Sie umfasst die Fähigkeit des Unterbewusstseins, auf Dinge zu reagieren, die der bewusste Verstand vielleicht nicht wahrnimmt.
Die Wahrnehmung ermöglicht es einem Charakter, Fallen, geschickt versteckte Objekte, Geheimgänge und ungewöhnliche oder verdächtige Elemente in der Umgebung zu erkennen.

languages.text:
Cette compétence repose sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristique{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}.
Elle mesure la capacité à réagir de manière inconsciente à des choses que l'esprit ne perçoit pas consciemment.
La Vigilance permet au personnage de détecter les pièges, les objets habilement dissimulés, les passages secrets et les éléments inhabituels ou suspects de l'environnement.
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It encompasses the subconscious ability to react to things that the conscious mind may not perceive.
Awareness allows a character to notice traps, cleverly hidden objects, secret passages, and unusual or suspicious elements in the environment.

traits.locale_text:
Cette compétence repose sur la caractéristique Perception.
Elle mesure la capacité à réagir de manière inconsciente à des choses que l'esprit ne perçoit pas de manière consciente.
La Conscience permet au personnage de détecter les pièges, les objets habilement dissimulés, les passages secrets et les éléments inhabituels ou suspects de l'environnement.

languages.text:
此技能受{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}影响。
代表角色通过潜意识，对无法明显感知的事物做出反应的能力。
警觉技能可以使角色留意到陷阱、隐藏物体、秘密通道，以及环境中不同寻常的物件或可疑事物。
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It encompasses the subconscious ability to react to things that the conscious mind may not perceive.
Awareness allows a character to notice traps, cleverly hidden objects, secret passages, and unusual or suspicious elements in the environment.

traits.locale_text:
此技能受感知属性影响。
代表角色通过潜意识，对无法明显感知的事物做出反应的能力。
警觉技能可以使角色留意到陷阱、隐藏物体、秘密通道，以及环境中不同寻常的物件或可疑事物。

languages.original_text:
This skill encompasses the subconscious ability to react to things that conscious mind may not perceive.
It allows to notice threats — such as ambushes, traps, or cleverly hidden objects — or slight changes in the environment.

languages.text:
Esta habilidad se basa en la {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}característica{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del personaje.
Comprende la capacidad subconsciente de reaccionar a cosas que la mente consciente tal vez no perciba.
La Atención permite que un personaje detecte trampas, objetos escondidos, pasadizos secretos y elementos diferentes o sospechosos del entorno.
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It encompasses the subconscious ability to react to things that the conscious mind may not perceive.
Awareness allows a character to notice traps, cleverly hidden objects, secret passages, and unusual or suspicious elements in the environment.

traits.locale_text:
Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} se basa en la característica de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} del personaje.
Comprende la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} subconsciente de reaccionar a cosas que la mente consciente tal vez no perciba.
La {g|Encyclopedia:SkillAwareness}Atención{/g} permite que un personaje detecte trampas, objetos escondidos, pasadizos secretos y elementos diferentes o sospechosos del entorno.

languages.text:
Этот навык зависит от {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристики{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g}.
Он отражает подсознательную способность персонажа реагировать на происходящие вокруг события.
Также этот навык позволяет замечать ловушки, хитро спрятанные предметы и потайные ходы или обращать внимание на необычные или подозрительные детали в окружающей обстановке.
languages.original_text:
This skill is affected by the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristic{/g}.
It encompasses the subconscious ability to react to things that the conscious mind may not perceive.
Awareness allows a character to notice traps, cleverly hidden objects, secret passages, and unusual or suspicious elements in the environment.

languages.text:
このスキルは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}の影響を受ける。
これには、意識的な心が認識できないものに反応する潜在意識アビリティが含まれる。
認識力により、キャラクターは環境内の罠、巧妙に隠されたオブジェクト、秘密の通路、異常または疑わしい要素に気づくことができる。
languages.original_text:

It encompasses the subconscious ability to react to things that the conscious mind may not perceive.
Awareness allows a character to notice traps, cleverly hidden objects, secret passages, and unusual or suspicious elements in the environment.

traits.locale_text:
このスキルは認知力特性の影響を受ける。
これには、意識的な心が認識できないものに反応する潜在意識アビリティが含まれる。
認識力により、キャラクターは環境内の罠、巧妙に隠されたオブジェクト、秘密の通路、異常または疑わしい要素に気づくことができる。
